title: Greyed Out Ward, can't change skin
body:
I just noticed today I cannot change my ward skins. I saw this was an issue in 2015, but didn't see anything about a fix. I'm currently stuck with one ward skin. Please let me know if there's a way to fix. 

Thank you,

Nya

replies.body: Hmmmmmm I went ahead and checked out your account and I do see those 5 different ward skins available. There might be some kind of corrupted file with the ward skin you're stuck on, so let's first see if a client repair will fix that up. Go into the client settings and hit Initiate Full Repair. Let me know if you're still stuck with ol' Pengu!

Hey!

I think it worked, I didn't have a chance to check if it was just an issue in the Legacy client before it was retired. BUT anyways, I can change wards now. 

Thank you!! 
Nya
